snippet: Wawrinka beat Tomas Berdych for the sixth straight time, winning by 4-6, 6-3, 6-4 at the World Tennis Tournament in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, to secure his first indoor title.
abstract: Stan Wawrinka beats Tomas Berdych, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4, at World Tennis Tournament in Rotterdam; other tennis scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Wawrinka beat Tomas Berdych for the sixth straight time, winning by 4-6, 6-3, 6-4 at the World Tennis Tournament in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, to secure his first indoor title.

headline.main: Stan Wawrinka Takes First Indoor Title
